title: Sir Kled Price
body:
The listed price for Sir Kled is 1350 in the store, is that correct? 
Sir Kled was 975 on the PBE and in the initial announcement and there was no messaging that the price was increased, just making sure that there isn't a bug or anything.

replies.body:
We dun goofed and released it as the wrong price in the client. It as since been changed to 975 RP as it was originally announced, so if you hop into the store you should see the updated price. 

Let me know if you have any questions!

you'll reimburse the poor players who paid 1350, correct?
How should they go about that? 
contact support?
would it be an automatic reimbursement?
There was an automatic wave of reimbursement that went out for this price different. If you've been missed on that, let me know and I'll look into it.

I just bought Sir Kled and it is shown as an epic skin. 
https://imgur.com/a/paDin
